turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor matematik problemini düşünürsem, çözümü bulabilirim.
english_example_sentence: If I think about this difficult math problem, I can find the solution.
russian_example_sentence: Если я подумаю об этой сложной математической задаче, я смогу найти решение.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zor matematik problemini ______, çözümü bulabilirim.
